Brian McDermott has admitted he and his side have failed after Featherstone Rovers were dumped out of the play-offs by part-time minnows Batley Bulldogs.

articles.title: Leicester City 0-2 Aston Villa: Rachel Daly scores again as Villa extend winning start - BBC
articles.description: Rachel Daly scores her third goal in two games as Aston Villa beat Leicester City to win consecutive Women's Super League games for the very first time.
articles.content:
Aston Villa won both meetings with Leicester City 2-1 last season
Rachel Daly scored again as Aston Villa beat Leicester City to record consecutive Women's Super League victories for the first time.… [+5903 chars]
